name: Chandrashekher Prasad
designation: B.Tech Student | Frontend Developer | Tech Enthusiast
summary: I am a passionate and dedicated B.Tech student at Maharaja Agrasen Institute of Technology, New Delhi, specializing in Frontend Development and exploring the world of technology. With expertise in data structures and algorithms in Java and a robust foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I am continuously enhancing my skills by learning React JS and working on innovative projects. I also have hands-on experience with C and Python programming.

projects.name: GitHubUserFinder
projects.description: A web application leveraging the GitHub API to fetch and display user details, repositories, and contributions in a dynamic, responsive interface.

projects.name: NotesApp
projects.description: A multi-functional note-taking app allowing users to create, edit, and save notes locally in their browser.

projects.name: InsectCatchGame
projects.description: A fun interactive game where users catch as many insects as they can within a time limit.

projects.name: TodoListManager
projects.description: A productivity tool that allows users to create, organize, and manage their daily tasks efficiently.

projects.name: PasswordGenerator
projects.description: A utility app that generates secure, random passwords of customizable length to enhance online security.

education.degree: B.Tech in Information Technology and Engineering
education.institution: Maharaja Agrasen Institute of Technology, New Delhi

achievements: Completed 15+ projects in web development, showcasing creativity and technical proficiency.
